00096 static DdNode * cuddAddPermuteRecur ARGS((DdManager *manager, DdHashTable *table, DdNode *node, int *permut));
00097 static DdNode * cuddBddPermuteRecur ARGS((DdManager *manager, DdHashTable *table, DdNode *node, int *permut));
00098 static DdNode * cuddAddVectorComposeRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdHashTable *table, DdNode *f, DdNode **vector, int deepest));
00099 static DdNode * cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, DdNode **vector, DdNode *key, DdNode *cube, int lastsub));
00100 static DdNode * cuddBddVectorComposeRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdHashTable *table, DdNode *f, DdNode **vector, int deepest));
00101 DD_INLINE static int ddIsIthAddVar ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, unsigned int i));

00125 DdNode *
00126 Cudd_bddCompose(
00127   DdManager * dd,
00128   DdNode * f,
00129   DdNode * g,
00130   int  v)
00131 {
00132     DdNode *proj, *res;
00133 
00134     /* Sanity check. */
00135     if (v < 0 || v > dd->size) return(NULL);
00136 
00137     proj =  dd->vars[v];
00138     do {
00139         dd->reordered = 0;
00140         res = cuddBddComposeRecur(dd,f,g,proj);
00141     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00142     return(res);
00143 
00144 } /* end of Cudd_bddCompose */

00173 
00174     proj =  dd->vars[v];
00175     do {
00176         dd->reordered = 0;
00177         res = cuddAddComposeRecur(dd,f,g,proj);

00200 DdNode *
00201 Cudd_addPermute(
00202   DdManager * manager,
00203   DdNode * node,
00204   int * permut)
00205 {
00206     DdHashTable         *table;
00207     DdNode              *res;
00208 
00209     do {
00210         manager->reordered = 0;
00211         table = cuddHashTableInit(manager,1,2);
00212         if (table == NULL) return(NULL);
00213         /* Recursively solve the problem. */
00214         res = cuddAddPermuteRecur(manager,table,node,permut);
00215         if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);
00216         /* Dispose of local cache. */
00217         cuddHashTableQuit(table);
00218     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00219 
00220     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00221     return(res);
00222 
00223 } /* end of Cudd_addPermute */

00241 DdNode *
00242 Cudd_addSwapVariables(
00243   DdManager * dd,
00244   DdNode * f,
00245   DdNode ** x,
00246   DdNode ** y,
00247   int  n)
00248 {
00249     DdNode *swapped;
00250     int  i, j, k;
00251     int  *permut;
00252 
00253     permut = ALLOC(int,dd->size);
00254     if (permut == NULL) {
00255         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00256         return(NULL);
00257     }
00258     for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) permut[i] = i;
00259     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00260         j = x[i]->index;
00261         k = y[i]->index;
00262         permut[j] = k;
00263         permut[k] = j;
00264     }
00265 
00266     swapped = Cudd_addPermute(dd,f,permut);
00267     FREE(permut);
00268 
00269     return(swapped);
00270 
00271 } /* end of Cudd_addSwapVariables */

00304         if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);

00307 
00308     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00309 
00310     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00311     return(res);

00313 } /* end of Cudd_bddPermute */

00379 DdNode *
00380 Cudd_bddAdjPermuteX(
00381   DdManager * dd,
00382   DdNode * B,
00383   DdNode ** x,
00384   int  n)
00385 {
00386     DdNode *swapped;
00387     int  i, j, k;
00388     int  *permut;
00389 
00390     permut = ALLOC(int,dd->size);
00391     if (permut == NULL) {
00392         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00393         return(NULL);
00394     }
00395     for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) permut[i] = i;
00396     for (i = 0; i < n-2; i += 3) {
00397         j = x[i]->index;
00398         k = x[i+1]->index;
00399         permut[j] = k;
00400         permut[k] = j;
00401     }
00402 
00403     swapped = Cudd_bddPermute(dd,B,permut);
00404     FREE(permut);
00405 
00406     return(swapped);
00407 
00408 } /* end of Cudd_bddAdjPermuteX */

00430 DdNode *
00431 Cudd_addVectorCompose(
00432   DdManager * dd,
00433   DdNode * f,
00434   DdNode ** vector)
00435 {
00436     DdHashTable         *table;
00437     DdNode              *res;
00438     int                 deepest;
00439     int                 i;
00440 
00441     do {
00442         dd->reordered = 0;
00443         /* Initialize local cache. */
00444         table = cuddHashTableInit(dd,1,2);
00445         if (table == NULL) return(NULL);
00446 
00447         /* Find deepest real substitution. */
00448         for (deepest = dd->size - 1; deepest >= 0; deepest--) {
00449             i = dd->invperm[deepest];
00450             if (!ddIsIthAddVar(dd,vector[i],i)) {
00451                 break;
00452             }
00453         }
00454 
00455         /* Recursively solve the problem. */
00456         res = cuddAddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,f,vector,deepest);
00457         if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);
00458 
00459         /* Dispose of local cache. */
00460         cuddHashTableQuit(table);
00461     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00462 
00463     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00464     return(res);
00465 
00466 } /* end of Cudd_addVectorCompose */

00468 
00489 DdNode *
00490 Cudd_addNonSimCompose(
00491   DdManager * dd,
00492   DdNode * f,
00493   DdNode ** vector)
00494 {
00495     DdNode              *cube, *key, *var, *tmp, *piece;
00496     DdNode              *res;
00497     int                 i, lastsub;
00498 
00499     /* The cache entry for this function is composed of three parts:
00500     ** f itself, the replacement relation, and the cube of the
00501     ** variables being substituted.
00502     ** The replacement relation is the product of the terms (yi EXNOR gi).
00503     ** This apporach allows us to use the global cache for this function,
00504     ** with great savings in memory with respect to using arrays for the
00505     ** cache entries.
00506     ** First we build replacement relation and cube of substituted
00507     ** variables from the vector specifying the desired composition.
00508     */
00509     key = DD_ONE(dd);
00510     cuddRef(key);
00511     cube = DD_ONE(dd);
00512     cuddRef(cube);
00513     for (i = (int) dd->size - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00514         if (ddIsIthAddVar(dd,vector[i],(unsigned int)i)) {
00515             continue;
00516         }
00517         var = Cudd_addIthVar(dd,i);
00518         if (var == NULL) {
00519             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00520             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00521             return(NULL);
00522         }
00523         cuddRef(var);
00524         /* Update cube. */
00525         tmp = Cudd_addApply(dd,Cudd_addTimes,var,cube);
00526         if (tmp == NULL) {
00527             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00528             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00529             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00530             return(NULL);
00531         }
00532         cuddRef(tmp);
00533         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00534         cube = tmp;
00535         /* Update replacement relation. */
00536         piece = Cudd_addApply(dd,Cudd_addXnor,var,vector[i]);
00537         if (piece == NULL) {
00538             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00539             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00540             return(NULL);
00541         }
00542         cuddRef(piece);
00543         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00544         tmp = Cudd_addApply(dd,Cudd_addTimes,key,piece);
00545         if (tmp == NULL) {
00546             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00547             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,piece);
00548             return(NULL);
00549         }
00550         cuddRef(tmp);
00551         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00552         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,piece);
00553         key = tmp;
00554     }
00555 
00556     /* Now try composition, until no reordering occurs. */
00557     do {
00558         /* Find real substitution with largest index. */
00559         for (lastsub = dd->size - 1; lastsub >= 0; lastsub--) {
00560             if (!ddIsIthAddVar(dd,vector[lastsub],(unsigned int)lastsub)) {
00561                 break;
00562             }
00563         }
00564 
00565         /* Recursively solve the problem. */
00566         dd->reordered = 0;
00567         res = cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur(dd,f,vector,key,cube,lastsub+1);
00568         if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);
00569 
00570     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00571 
00572     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key);
00573     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00574     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00575     return(res);
00576 
00577 } /* end of Cudd_addNonSimCompose */
00578 
00579 
00598 DdNode *
00599 Cudd_bddVectorCompose(
00600   DdManager * dd,
00601   DdNode * f,
00602   DdNode ** vector)
00603 {
00604     DdHashTable         *table;
00605     DdNode              *res;
00606     int                 deepest;
00607     int                 i;
00608 
00609     do {
00610         dd->reordered = 0;
00611         /* Initialize local cache. */
00612         table = cuddHashTableInit(dd,1,2);
00613         if (table == NULL) return(NULL);
00614 
00615         /* Find deepest real substitution. */
00616         for (deepest = dd->size - 1; deepest >= 0; deepest--) {
00617             i = dd->invperm[deepest];
00618             if (vector[i] != dd->vars[i]) {
00619                 break;
00620             }
00621         }
00622 
00623         /* Recursively solve the problem. */
00624         res = cuddBddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,f,vector, deepest);
00625         if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);
00626 
00627         /* Dispose of local cache. */
00628         cuddHashTableQuit(table);
00629     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00630 
00631     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00632     return(res);
00633 
00634 } /* end of Cudd_bddVectorCompose */

00641 
00657 DdNode *
00658 cuddBddComposeRecur(
00659   DdManager * dd,
00660   DdNode * f,
00661   DdNode * g,
00662   DdNode * proj)
00663 {
00664     DdNode      *F, *G, *f1, *f0, *g1, *g0, *r, *t, *e;
00665     unsigned int v, topf, topg, topindex;
00666     int         comple;
00667 
00668     v = dd->perm[proj->index];
00669     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00670     topf = cuddI(dd,F->index);
00671 
00672     /* Terminal case. Subsumes the test for constant f. */
00673     if (topf > v) return(f);
00674 
00675     /* We solve the problem for a regular pointer, and then complement
00676     ** the result if the pointer was originally complemented.
00677     */
00678     comple = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00679 
00680     /* Check cache. */
00681     r = cuddCacheLookup(dd,cuddBddComposeRecur,F,g,proj);
00682     if (r != NULL) {
00683         return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00684     }
00685 
00686     if (topf == v) {
00687         /* Compose. */
00688         f1 = cuddT(F);
00689         f0 = cuddE(F);
00690         r = cuddBddIteRecur(dd, g, f1, f0);
00691         if (r == NULL) return(NULL);
00692     } else {
00693         /* Compute cofactors of f and g. Remember the index of the top
00694         ** variable.
00695         */
00696         G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00697         topg = cuddI(dd,G->index);
00698         if (topf > topg) {
00699             topindex = G->index;
00700             f1 = f0 = F;
00701         } else {
00702             topindex = F->index;
00703             f1 = cuddT(F);
00704             f0 = cuddE(F);
00705         }
00706         if (topg > topf) {
00707             g1 = g0 = g;
00708         } else {
00709             g1 = cuddT(G);
00710             g0 = cuddE(G);
00711             if (g != G) {
00712                 g1 = Cudd_Not(g1);
00713                 g0 = Cudd_Not(g0);
00714             }
00715         }
00716         /* Recursive step. */
00717         t = cuddBddComposeRecur(dd, f1, g1, proj);
00718         if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00719         cuddRef(t);
00720         e = cuddBddComposeRecur(dd, f0, g0, proj);
00721         if (e == NULL) {
00722             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t);
00723             return(NULL);
00724         }
00725         cuddRef(e);
00726 
00727         r = cuddBddIteRecur(dd, dd->vars[topindex], t, e);
00728         if (r == NULL) {
00729             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t);
00730             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, e);
00731             return(NULL);
00732         }
00733         cuddRef(r);
00734         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, t); /* t & e not necessarily part of r */
00735         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, e);
00736         cuddDeref(r);
00737     }
00738 
00739     cuddCacheInsert(dd,cuddBddComposeRecur,F,g,proj,r);
00740 
00741     return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00742 
00743 } /* end of cuddBddComposeRecur */
00744 
00745 
00758 DdNode *
00759 cuddAddComposeRecur(
00760   DdManager * dd,
00761   DdNode * f,
00762   DdNode * g,
00763   DdNode * proj)
00764 {
00765     DdNode *f1, *f0, *g1, *g0, *r, *t, *e;
00766     unsigned int v, topf, topg, topindex;
00767 
00768     v = dd->perm[proj->index];
00769     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00770 
00771     /* Terminal case. Subsumes the test for constant f. */
00772     if (topf > v) return(f);
00773 
00774     /* Check cache. */
00775     r = cuddCacheLookup(dd,cuddAddComposeRecur,f,g,proj);
00776     if (r != NULL) {
00777         return(r);
00778     }
00779 
00780     if (topf == v) {
00781         /* Compose. */
00782         f1 = cuddT(f);
00783         f0 = cuddE(f);
00784         r = cuddAddIteRecur(dd, g, f1, f0);
00785         if (r == NULL) return(NULL);
00786     } else {
00787         /* Compute cofactors of f and g. Remember the index of the top
00788         ** variable.
00789         */
00790         topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00791         if (topf > topg) {
00792             topindex = g->index;
00793             f1 = f0 = f;
00794         } else {
00795             topindex = f->index;
00796             f1 = cuddT(f);
00797             f0 = cuddE(f);
00798         }
00799         if (topg > topf) {
00800             g1 = g0 = g;
00801         } else {
00802             g1 = cuddT(g);
00803             g0 = cuddE(g);
00804         }
00805         /* Recursive step. */
00806         t = cuddAddComposeRecur(dd, f1, g1, proj);
00807         if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00808         cuddRef(t);
00809         e = cuddAddComposeRecur(dd, f0, g0, proj);
00810         if (e == NULL) {
00811             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00812             return(NULL);
00813         }
00814         cuddRef(e);
00815 
00816         if (t == e) {
00817             r = t;
00818         } else {
00819             r = cuddUniqueInter(dd, (int) topindex, t, e);
00820             if (r == NULL) {
00821                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00822                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00823                 return(NULL);
00824             }
00825         }
00826         cuddDeref(t);
00827         cuddDeref(e);
00828     }
00829 
00830     cuddCacheInsert(dd,cuddAddComposeRecur,f,g,proj,r);
00831 
00832     return(r);
00833 
00834 } /* end of cuddAddComposeRecur */
00835

00838 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
00839 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00840 
00841 
00862 static DdNode *
00863 cuddAddPermuteRecur(
00864   DdManager * manager /* DD manager */,
00865   DdHashTable * table /* computed table */,
00866   DdNode * node /* ADD to be reordered */,
00867   int * permut /* permutation array */)
00868 {
00869     DdNode      *T,*E;
00870     DdNode      *res,*var;
00871     int         index;
00872     
00873     /* Check for terminal case of constant node. */
00874     if (cuddIsConstant(node)) {
00875         return(node);
00876     }
00877 
00878     /* If problem already solved, look up answer and return. */
00879     if ((res = cuddHashTableLookup1(table,node)) != NULL) {
00880 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00881         addPermuteRecurHits++;
00882 #endif
00883         return(res);
00884     }
00885 
00886     /* Split and recur on children of this node. */
00887     T = cuddAddPermuteRecur(manager,table,cuddT(node),permut);
00888     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00889     cuddRef(T);
00890     E = cuddAddPermuteRecur(manager,table,cuddE(node),permut);
00891     if (E == NULL) {
00892         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, T);
00893         return(NULL);
00894     }
00895     cuddRef(E);
00896 
00897     /* Move variable that should be in this position to this position
00898     ** by creating a single var ADD for that variable, and calling
00899     ** cuddAddIteRecur with the T and E we just created.
00900     */
00901     index = permut[node->index];
00902     var = cuddUniqueInter(manager,index,DD_ONE(manager),DD_ZERO(manager));
00903     if (var == NULL) return(NULL);
00904     cuddRef(var);
00905     res = cuddAddIteRecur(manager,var,T,E);
00906     if (res == NULL) {
00907         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,var);
00908         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, T);
00909         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, E);
00910         return(NULL);
00911     }
00912     cuddRef(res);
00913     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,var);
00914     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, T);
00915     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, E);
00916 
00917     /* Do not keep the result if the reference count is only 1, since
00918     ** it will not be visited again.
00919     */
00920     if (node->ref != 1) {
00921         ptrint fanout = (ptrint) node->ref;
00922         cuddSatDec(fanout);
00923         if (!cuddHashTableInsert1(table,node,res,fanout)) {
00924             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, res);
00925             return(NULL);
00926         }
00927     }
00928     cuddDeref(res);
00929     return(res);
00930 
00931 } /* end of cuddAddPermuteRecur */
00932 
00933 
00954 static DdNode *
00955 cuddBddPermuteRecur(
00956   DdManager * manager /* DD manager */,
00957   DdHashTable * table /* computed table */,
00958   DdNode * node /* BDD to be reordered */,
00959   int * permut /* permutation array */)
00960 {
00961     DdNode      *N,*T,*E;
00962     DdNode      *res;
00963     int         index;
00964 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00965     DdNode *regResult;
00966 #endif
00967 
00968     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00969 
00970     /* Check for terminal case of constant node. */
00971     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
00972         return(node);
00973     }
00974 
00975     /* If problem already solved, look up answer and return. */
00976     if ((res = cuddHashTableLookup1(table,N)) != NULL) {
00977 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00978         bddPermuteRecurHits++;
00979 #endif
00980         return(Cudd_NotCond(res,N != node));
00981     }
00982 
00983     /* Split and recur on children of this node. */
00984     T = cuddBddPermuteRecur(manager,table,cuddT(N),permut);
00985     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00986     cuddRef(T);
00987     E = cuddBddPermuteRecur(manager,table,cuddE(N),permut);
00988     if (E == NULL) {
00989         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, T);
00990         return(NULL);
00991     }
00992     cuddRef(E);
00993 
00994     /* Move variable that should be in this position to this position
00995     ** by retrieving the single var BDD for that variable, and calling
00996     ** cuddBddIteRecur with the T and E we just created.
00997     */
00998     index = permut[N->index];
00999     res = cuddBddIteRecur(manager,manager->vars[index],T,E);
01000     if (res == NULL) {
01001         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, T);
01002         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, E);
01003         return(NULL);
01004     }
01005     cuddRef(res);
01006     Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, T);
01007     Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, E);
01008 
01009     /* Do not keep the result if the reference count is only 1, since
01010     ** it will not be visited again.
01011     */
01012     if (N->ref != 1) {
01013         ptrint fanout = (ptrint) N->ref;
01014         cuddSatDec(fanout);
01015         if (!cuddHashTableInsert1(table,N,res,fanout)) {
01016             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(manager, res);
01017             return(NULL);
01018         }
01019     }
01020     cuddDeref(res);
01021     return(Cudd_NotCond(res,N != node));
01022 
01023 } /* end of cuddBddPermuteRecur */
01024 
01025 
01037 static DdNode *
01038 cuddAddVectorComposeRecur(
01039   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01040   DdHashTable * table /* computed table */,
01041   DdNode * f /* ADD in which to compose */,
01042   DdNode ** vector /* functions to substitute */,
01043   int  deepest /* depth of deepest substitution */)
01044 {
01045     DdNode      *T,*E;
01046     DdNode      *res;
01047 
01048     /* If we are past the deepest substitution, return f. */
01049     if (cuddI(dd,f->index) > deepest) {
01050         return(f);
01051     }
01052 
01053     if ((res = cuddHashTableLookup1(table,f)) != NULL) {
01054 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01055         addVectorComposeHits++;
01056 #endif
01057         return(res);
01058     }
01059 
01060     /* Split and recur on children of this node. */
01061     T = cuddAddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,cuddT(f),vector,deepest);
01062     if (T == NULL)  return(NULL);
01063     cuddRef(T);
01064     E = cuddAddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,cuddE(f),vector,deepest);
01065     if (E == NULL) {
01066         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
01067         return(NULL);
01068     }
01069     cuddRef(E);
01070 
01071     /* Retrieve the 0-1 ADD for the current top variable and call
01072     ** cuddAddIteRecur with the T and E we just created.
01073     */
01074     res = cuddAddIteRecur(dd,vector[f->index],T,E);
01075     if (res == NULL) {
01076         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
01077         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
01078         return(NULL);
01079     }
01080     cuddRef(res);
01081     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
01082     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
01083 
01084     /* Do not keep the result if the reference count is only 1, since
01085     ** it will not be visited again
01086     */
01087     if (f->ref != 1) {
01088         ptrint fanout = (ptrint) f->ref;
01089         cuddSatDec(fanout);
01090         if (!cuddHashTableInsert1(table,f,res,fanout)) {
01091             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
01092             return(NULL);
01093         }
01094     }
01095     cuddDeref(res);
01096     return(res);
01097 
01098 } /* end of cuddAddVectorComposeRecur */
01099 
01100 
01112 static DdNode *
01113 cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur(
01114   DdManager * dd,
01115   DdNode * f,
01116   DdNode ** vector,
01117   DdNode * key,
01118   DdNode * cube,
01119   int  lastsub)
01120 {
01121     DdNode *f1, *f0, *key1, *key0, *cube1, *var;
01122     DdNode *T,*E;
01123     DdNode *r;
01124     unsigned int top, topf, topk, topc;
01125     unsigned int index;
01126     int i;
01127     DdNode **vect1;
01128     DdNode **vect0;
01129     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
01130 
01131     /* If we are past the deepest substitution, return f. */
01132     if (cube == DD_ONE(dd) || Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
01133         return(f);
01134     }
01135 
01136     /* If problem already solved, look up answer and return. */
01137     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *))
01138         Cudd_addNonSimCompose;
01139     r = cuddCacheLookup(dd,cacheOp,f,key,cube);
01140     if (r != NULL) {
01141         return(r);
01142     }
01143 
01144     /* Find top variable. we just need to look at f, key, and cube,
01145     ** because all the varibles in the gi are in key.
01146     */
01147     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
01148     topk = cuddI(dd,key->index);
01149     top = ddMin(topf,topk);
01150     topc = cuddI(dd,cube->index);
01151     top = ddMin(top,topc);
01152     index = dd->invperm[top];
01153 
01154     /* Compute the cofactors. */
01155     if (topf == top) {
01156         f1 = cuddT(f);
01157         f0 = cuddE(f);
01158     } else {
01159         f1 = f0 = f;
01160     }
01161     if (topc == top) {
01162         cube1 = cuddT(cube);
01163         /* We want to eliminate vector[index] from key. Otherwise
01164         ** cache performance is severely affected. Hence we
01165         ** existentially quantify the variable with index "index" from key.
01166         */
01167         var = Cudd_addIthVar(dd, (int) index);
01168         if (var == NULL) {
01169             return(NULL);
01170         }
01171         cuddRef(var);
01172         key1 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(dd, key, var);
01173         if (key1 == NULL) {
01174             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
01175             return(NULL);
01176         }
01177         cuddRef(key1);
01178         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
01179         key0 = key1;
01180     } else {
01181         cube1 = cube;
01182         if (topk == top) {
01183             key1 = cuddT(key);
01184             key0 = cuddE(key);
01185         } else {
01186             key1 = key0 = key;
01187         }
01188         cuddRef(key1);
01189     }
01190 
01191     /* Allocate two new vectors for the cofactors of vector. */
01192     vect1 = ALLOC(DdNode *,lastsub);
01193     if (vect1 == NULL) {
01194         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01195         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key1);
01196         return(NULL);
01197     }
01198     vect0 = ALLOC(DdNode *,lastsub);
01199     if (vect0 == NULL) {
01200         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01201         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key1);
01202         FREE(vect1);
01203         return(NULL);
01204     }
01205 
01206     /* Cofactor the gi. Eliminate vect1[index] and vect0[index], because
01207     ** we do not need them.
01208     */
01209     for (i = 0; i < lastsub; i++) {
01210         DdNode *gi = vector[i];
01211         if (gi == NULL) {
01212             vect1[i] = vect0[i] = NULL;
01213         } else if (gi->index == index) {
01214             vect1[i] = cuddT(gi);
01215             vect0[i] = cuddE(gi);
01216         } else {
01217             vect1[i] = vect0[i] = gi;
01218         }
01219     }
01220     vect1[index] = vect0[index] = NULL;
01221 
01222     /* Recur on children. */
01223     T = cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur(dd,f1,vect1,key1,cube1,lastsub);
01224     FREE(vect1);
01225     if (T == NULL) {
01226         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key1);
01227         FREE(vect0);
01228         return(NULL);
01229     }
01230     cuddRef(T);
01231     E = cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur(dd,f0,vect0,key0,cube1,lastsub);
01232     FREE(vect0);
01233     if (E == NULL) {
01234         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key1);
01235         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
01236         return(NULL);
01237     }
01238     cuddRef(E);
01239     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,key1);
01240 
01241     /* Retrieve the 0-1 ADD for the current top variable from vector,
01242     ** and call cuddAddIteRecur with the T and E we just created.
01243     */
01244     r = cuddAddIteRecur(dd,vector[index],T,E);
01245     if (r == NULL) {
01246         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
01247         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
01248         return(NULL);
01249     }
01250     cuddRef(r);
01251     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
01252     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
01253     cuddDeref(r);
01254 
01255     /* Store answer to trim recursion. */
01256     cuddCacheInsert(dd,cacheOp,f,key,cube,r);
01257 
01258     return(r);
01259 
01260 } /* end of cuddAddNonSimComposeRecur */
01261 
01262 
01274 static DdNode *
01275 cuddBddVectorComposeRecur(
01276   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01277   DdHashTable * table /* computed table */,
01278   DdNode * f /* BDD in which to compose */,
01279   DdNode ** vector /* functions to be composed */,
01280   int  deepest /* depth of the deepest substitution */)
01281 {
01282     DdNode      *F,*T,*E;
01283     DdNode      *res;
01284 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01285     DdNode *regResult;
01286 #endif
01287 
01288     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
01289 
01290     /* If we are past the deepest substitution, return f. */
01291     if (cuddI(dd,F->index) > deepest) {
01292         return(f);
01293     }
01294 
01295     /* If problem already solved, look up answer and return. */
01296     if ((res = cuddHashTableLookup1(table,F)) != NULL) {
01297 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01298         bddVectorComposeHits++;
01299 #endif
01300         return(Cudd_NotCond(res,F != f));
01301     }
01302 
01303     /* Split and recur on children of this node. */
01304     T = cuddBddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,cuddT(F),vector, deepest);
01305     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
01306     cuddRef(T);
01307     E = cuddBddVectorComposeRecur(dd,table,cuddE(F),vector, deepest);
01308     if (E == NULL) {
01309         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, T);
01310         return(NULL);
01311     }
01312     cuddRef(E);
01313 
01314     /* Retrieve the 0-1 ADD for the current top variable and call
01315     ** cuddBddIteRecur with the T and E we just created.
01316     */
01317     res = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,vector[F->index],T,E);
01318     if (res == NULL) {
01319         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, T);
01320         Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, E);
01321         return(NULL);
01322     }
01323     cuddRef(res);
01324     Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, T);
01325     Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, E);   
01326 
01327     /* Do not keep the result if the reference count is only 1, since
01328     ** it will not be visited again
01329     */
01330     if (F->ref != 1) {
01331         ptrint fanout = (ptrint) F->ref;
01332         cuddSatDec(fanout);
01333         if (!cuddHashTableInsert1(table,F,res,fanout)) {
01334             Cudd_IterDerefBdd(dd, res);
01335             return(NULL);
01336         }
01337     }
01338     cuddDeref(res);
01339     return(Cudd_NotCond(res,F != f));
01340 
01341 } /* end of cuddBddVectorComposeRecur */
01342 
01343 
01356 DD_INLINE
01357 static int
01358 ddIsIthAddVar(
01359   DdManager * dd,
01360   DdNode * f,
01361   unsigned int  i)
01362 {
01363     return(f->index == i && cuddT(f) == DD_ONE(dd) && cuddE(f) == DD_ZERO(dd));
01364 
01365 } /* end of ddIsIthAddVar */
